data.text: The East Side Gallery – a 1.3 km long section of the Berlin Wall - is the largest open air gallery in the world. #TravelTuesday
Germany’s popular fast food dish Currywurst was invented in Berlin by Herta Heuwer in 1949. #TravelTuesday
Former Tempelhof Airport is now Berlin’s largest public park: Tempelhofer Feld. #TravelTuesday #AvGeek

The Lorelei rock near St. Goarshausen is the origin of the mystic tale about a siren distracting shipmen on the Rhine. #TravelTuesday
Former US-president Bill Clinton is said to be fan of Rhineland-Palatinate's most successful soccer club @Rote_Teufel. #TravelTuesday
